name: Gould Harrell
review: One of the best laptop ever i used. it  has strong processor and betary backup is more  than 5 hours

name: Delores Castaneda
review: A mid-life refresh adds new Intel processors and new Nvidia discrete graphics and an OLED display to an already fine laptop

name: Kramer Green
review: The latest edition of the XPS 15 looks brilliant, it's got great processing power and an excellent keyboard. If you can afford one, a USB-A port is about the only thing missing

name: Deanne Hubbard
review: It's the ultimate 15-inch laptop for those willing to trade battery life for a mesmerizing 3.5K OLED display

name: Lucia Shaw
review: Dell XPS 15 2020 offers excellent performance and one of the most immersive, colorful displays of any 15-inch laptop.

name: Abby Whitehead
review: The Dell XPS 15 is easily the best 15-inch laptop on the market, and in a lot of ways it's the best laptop period.
